values.locationDesc: Just 300 meters from the sea and near Playa Grande
values.amenitiesDesc: Pool, parking, and BBQ area to enjoy

intro.title: Your place in Mar del Plata
intro.description: Nogales offers apartments designed for those seeking quality of life by the sea. Privileged location, contemporary design, and top-tier amenities in one of the best spots in Mar del Plata.

units.title: Our Units
units.subtitle: Floor plans designed for every need

architecture.title: Design that inspires
architecture.description: A contemporary building in a privileged location. Spacious balconies, excellent natural lighting, and unique views just steps from the sea.

cta.title: Interested in a unit at Nogales?
cta.subtitle: Contact us for availability and payment options

executive.name: Executive Suite
executive.description: Premium unit with contemporary design, excellent natural lighting, and balcony with views. Ideal for investment or personal residence.

duplex2.name: 2-Room Duplex
duplex2.shortDesc: Living room and bedroom on two floors
duplex2.description: Two-story apartment with living-dining area, integrated kitchen, and bedroom upstairs. Balcony and excellent brightness. Perfect for couples or investment.

duplex3.name: 3-Room Duplex
duplex3.shortDesc: Two bedrooms and spacious living area
duplex3.description: Spacious two-story apartment with living-dining area, integrated kitchen, and two bedrooms. Ideal for families seeking comfort near the sea.

pool.name: Pool
pool.description: Outdoor pool to enjoy on warm days.

parking.name: Parking
parking.description: Covered parking included for your vehicle.

grill.name: BBQ Area
grill.description: Grill area to enjoy a barbecue with family and friends.

security.name: Security
security.description: Building with security for your peace of mind.

location.area: Mar del Plata, near Playa Grande
location.byCarDesc: Easy access from Route 2. Private parking included.
location.nearbyDesc: Steps from Playa Grande, restaurants, shops, and services.
location.beachDesc: Just 300 meters from the sea. Enjoy the coast year-round.
location.contactSubtitle: Interested in a unit? Write to us

footer.description: Real estate development in Mar del Plata. Spacious and bright apartments just 300 meters from the sea, near Playa Grande. Pool, parking, and BBQ area.
